sentences.en: After getting a good night's sleep, I decided to head back to HQ.
sentences.cn: 在很好地睡了一晚之后, 我决定回总部.

sentences.en: Auditing and controlling daily expenses of HQ and subsidiaries companies.
sentences.cn: 审计和控制总部和所有分公司的日常费用.

sentences.en: Behind it stood Burma Action's local HQ, a big but run-down house, two stories of worn wood and dirty concrete with a balcony on the left, cement garage on the right.
sentences.cn: 门后便是缅甸行动组织在当地的总部，这是大而破旧的两层楼房子，木材和混凝土材料都老化严重，左边是阳台，后边还有一个水泥砌成的车库。

sentences.en: Bob ordered brigade HQ to embark.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃命令旅指挥部登船。

sentences.en: But the era of the virtual HQ is still some way off.
sentences.cn: 不过,虚拟总部的时代仍未到来.

sentences.en: Company B Commander This is Command HQ . Move the soldiers forward 200.
sentences.cn: 这里是总指挥部,步兵向前推进200.

sentences.en: Coordinate with HQ audit and external audit about Medical Device and Drug.
sentences.cn: 协调中心审计,医疗器械和药品相关的外部审计.

sentences.en: Daily contacts with HQ, Area Stations and other Areas.
sentences.cn: 区域内、与总部和需要和分公司沟通的日常协调工作.

sentences.en: HQ of China Telecom ( the largest telecommunication management system implementing ISO 9000 SYSTEM ).
sentences.cn: 中国电信总部 ( 最大的电信管理系统实施ISO9000体系 ).

sentences.en: HQ: Delta Team have been dispatched and are on their way.
sentences.cn: 小队已被派遣并且正在行动中了.

sentences.en: Osean G HQ, requesting artillery support to the landing point!
sentences.cn: 呼叫总部, 请求炮火支援,目标:登陆点!

sentences.en: The company built a new HQ to centralise their administration.
sentences.cn: 公司建了新总部把管理集中起来.

sentences.en: The square in front of the HQ is a mass of blossoming trees.
sentences.cn: 总部前面的广场上有一大丛鲜花盛开的树木.

sentences.en: The wires trailed through other parts of the HQ into a next door building.
sentences.cn: 线路穿过总部的其他地方，接入邻近的建筑。

sentences.en: These were quickly reverse engineered and entered service as the HQ - 1 and soon after HQ - 2 systems.
sentences.cn: 它们被很快地仿制并以HQ -1 型以及随后的HQ -2 型的身份服役.

sentences.en: This information is subsequently sent to the HQ.
sentences.cn: 这一信息随后会被送到总部。
